description: This file defines a React-like component for the header UI of a notes application, handling user authentication display and navigation controls.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Defines a Qwik component for rendering the header with auth controls and navigation.
Wraps an async function to make it reactive in Qwik.

methods.name: useSignal
methods.description: Creates a reactive state signal for the menu open/closed state.
